  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```{r setup}
library(SigMoS)

```

## Assuming poisson

```{r}
res_pois = sigmos(data = BRCA21, k = 3, method = "Poisson")
```


## Assuming negative binomial

```{r}
res_nb = sigmos(data = BRCA21, k = 3, method = "NB")
```

## Assuming negative binomial with patient specific dispersion

```{r}
res_nb = sigmos(data = BRCA21, k = 3, method = "NB", patient_specific=TRUE)
```
